main event: On 21 Mar 61, two observers reported seeing an object that displayed characteristics of a bolide, including color change and bursting, while flying at an altitude of 8,500 feet.
interesting points: The sighting lasted about 6 minutes,One observer claimed to see a single object split into multiple fragments,The sighting occurred during a clear night,One observer described the colors observed as reddish,The observers described the motion of the fragments as 'tumbling' or 'rolling'.
sighted object: An object resembling a bolide, splitting into multiple fragments
witness description: Both observers were crew members of a P2V-7 aircraft, with experience in observing meteors.
